concept.description: Labels methods which are annotated with "@org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean" with "BeanProducer" and their return types with "Spring" and "Injectable".
concept.cypher: MATCH (:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(beanProducer:Method)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(annotationType:Type), (beanProducer)-[:RETURNS]->(injectable:Type) WHERE annotationType.fqn = "org.springframework.context.annotation.Bean" SET injectable:Spring:Injectable, beanProducer:Spring:BeanProducer RETURN injectable as Injectable, beanProducer as BeanProducer

constraint.description: Injectables types must not be instantiated directly except by @Bean methods or test code.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (injectable:Injectable:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(constructor:Constructor), (artifact:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(type:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(method:Method)-[newInstance:INVOKES]->(constructor) WHERE NOT ( (exists(artifact.type) and artifact.type="test-jar") OR method:Spring:BeanProducer ) RETURN type as Type, method as Method, injectable as Injectable, newInstance.lineNumber as LineNumber

constraint.description: Bean producer methods must be declared in configuration components.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (type:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(beanProducer:Method:BeanProducer)-[:RETURNS]->(injectable:Injectable) WHERE NOT type:Spring:Configuration RETURN beanProducer as BeanProducer, injectable as Injectable

concept.description: Labels all type members annotated with "@org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired" with "Spring" and "InjectionPoint".
concept.cypher: MATCH (injectionPoint:Member)-[:ANNOTATED_BY]->()-[:OF_TYPE]->(annotationType:Type) WHERE annotationType.fqn in [ "org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired", "javax.inject.Inject", "javax.annotation.Resource" ] SET injectionPoint:Spring:InjectionPoint RETURN injectionPoint as InjectionPoint

constraint.description: Field injection is not allowed, use constructor injection instead.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (type:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(field:Field:InjectionPoint), (artifact:Artifact)-[:CONTAINS]->(type:Type) WHERE NOT (exists(artifact.type) and artifact.type="test-jar") RETURN type as Type, field as Field

constraint.description: Fields of injectable types must not be manipulated, except from constructors.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (injectable:Injectable), (injectable)-[:DECLARES]->(method:Method)-[writes:WRITES]->(field:Field) WHERE NOT ( method:Constructor OR // method is a constructor (exists(field.static) AND field.static) // static fields ) RETURN injectable.fqn + "." + method.name + "(…) writes field '" + field.name + "' at line " + writes.lineNumber as Message, injectable as Injectable, method as Method, field as Field, writes.lineNumber as LineNumber

constraint.description: Prefer to use @PostConstruct over implementing InitializingBean.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (type:Type)-[:IMPLEMENTS]->(otherType:Type) WHERE otherType.fqn = "org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean" RETURN type as Type

constraint.description: Prefer to use @PreDestroy over implementing DisposableBean.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (type:Type)-[:IMPLEMENTS]->(otherType:Type) WHERE otherType.fqn = "org.springframework.beans.factory.DisposableBean" RETURN type as Type

constraint.description: Prefer to inject framework components over implementing '…Aware' interfaces.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (type:Type)-[:IMPLEMENTS]->(otherType:Type) WHERE otherType.fqn in [ "org.springframework.beans.factory.BeanFactoryAware", "org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware", "org.springframework.context.ApplicationEventPublisherAware" ] RETURN type as Type, otherType as ImplementedInterface

constraint.description: Injectable components must not be held in static variables.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (type:Type)-[:DECLARES]->(field:Field)-[:OF_TYPE]->(fieldType:Type:Injectable) WHERE field.static RETURN type as Type, field.name as Field

constraint.description: Injectable components must not be accessed from static variables.
constraint.cypher: MATCH (method:Method)-[:READS]->(field:Field)-[:OF_TYPE]->(fieldType:Type:Injectable) WHERE field.static RETURN method as Method, field.name as Field
